SEARCH
Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.appointment

Class AppointmentService

java.lang.Object
com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.appointment.AppointmentService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAppointmentService
@Service public class AppointmentService extends Object implements IAppointmentService
Service class for managing appointments. Provides functionality to create, update, cancel, approve, and manage appointments along with handling pets associated with appointments.

  • Method Details

    • createAppointment

      @Transactional public Appointment createAppointment(BookAppointmentRequest request, Long senderId, Long recipientId)
      Creates a new appointment and associates pets with it. Validates the sender and recipient, and ensures the sender does not exceed the maximum number of active appointments.
      Specified by:
      createAppointment in interface IAppointmentService
      Parameters:
      request - the appointment and pet details.
      senderId - the ID of the patient (sender).
      recipientId - the ID of the veterinarian (recipient).
      Returns:
      the created appointment.

    • countActiveAppointments

      private int countActiveAppointments(Long senderId)
      Counts the number of active appointments for a specific patient. An active appointment is defined as one whose status is neither COMPLETED, CANCELLED, nor NOT_APPROVED.
      Parameters:
      senderId - the ID of the patient whose active appointments are being counted.
      Returns:
      the count of active appointments for the given patient.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the updated appointment.

    • approveAppointment

      public Appointment approveAppointment(Long appointmentId)
      Approves an appointment that is currently waiting for approval.
      Specified by:
      approveAppointment in interface IAppointmentService
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment to approve.
      Returns:
      the updated appointment with APPROVED status.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is not allowed due to the current appointment status.

    • getAppointmentSummary

      public List<Map<String,Object>> getAppointmentSummary()
      Retrieves a summary of appointments grouped by their status. The summary includes the count of appointments for each status.
      Specified by:
      getAppointmentSummary in interface IAppointmentService
      Returns:
      a list of maps, where each map contains the status and the count.

    • createStatusSummaryMap

      private Map<String,Object> createStatusSummaryMap(AppointmentStatus status, Long value)
      Creates a summary map for a specific appointment status and its count.
      Parameters:
      status - the appointment status.
      value - the count of appointments with the given status.
      Returns:
      a map containing the status name and the count.

      Returns:
      a list of appointment IDs.

    • setAppointmentStatus

      public void setAppointmentStatus(Long appointmentId)
      Updates the status of an appointment based on the current date and time. The status transitions are handled as follows: - APPROVED -> UP_COMING if the appointment is upcoming. - UP_COMING -> ON_GOING if the appointment is currently taking place. - ON_GOING -> COMPLETED if the appointment has ended. - WAITING_FOR_APPROVAL -> NOT_APPROVED if the appointment time has passed without approval.
      Specified by:
      setAppointmentStatus in interface IAppointmentService
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment to update.
